mapper.insert: insert into member( member_id, name, pwd, regdate, phone, email, profile) values( #{id}, #{name}, #{pwd}, now(), #{phone}, #{email}, #{profile} )
mapper.select: select count(*) as count from member
select member_id as id, pwd, name from member where member_id = #{search}
select num, id, name, ssn, email, phone, subj, regdate from (select @rnum := @rnum +1 as num, s.* from (select @rnum := 0) r, student s)t where num between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select num, id, name, ssn, email, phone, subj, regdate from (select @rnum := @rnum +1 as num, s.* from (select @rnum := 0) r, student s where name like #{search} )t where num between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select id, name, ssn, email from student where id = #{search}
mapper.update: update member set pwd=#{pwd}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone} where member_id = #{id}
